***
## Pipette Puller Tender Notice - Advancing a Government Contract Award Notice

### Tender Reference
WS4213318486-Doc4317174470

### Tender Status
Expired

### Tender Category
*GD*

### Contracting Entity
[Ministère des Travaux publics et des Services gouvernementaux (TPSGC/PWGSC)](http://www.tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca/fr)
11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5, Canada

### End User Entity
[Ministère de la Santé (SC)](http://www.sante.gouv.qc.ca)
Address Locator 0900C2, Ottawa, Ontario, K1A 0K9, Canada

### Notice Type
Advance Contract Award Notice (ACAN)

### Tender Description
The Biologic and Radiopharmaceutical Drugs Directorate (BRDD) of Health Canada is seeking a Laser-based Micropipette Puller to conduct quantitative assays using mass spectrometry methods.

### Solicitation Requirements
The proposer must submit a statement of capabilities, demonstrating that its product/equipment/system (as appropriate) meets the specifications listed in the ACAN document.

### Important Submission Note
Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time. All required supporting documentation and statement of capabilities must be submitted by 06 December 2023 at 14:00 EST. Statements submitted after this time will be declared non-responsive.
